overview:
Rajat Taneja is EVP and Chief Technology Officer of Electronic Arts, Inc. He is responsible for EA’s core technology direction as well as the R&D of EAs online digital platform and shared game technologies. Additionally, Rajat is also responsible for EA’s online operations and infrastructure.

Prior to joining EA, Rajat spent 15 years with Microsoft in various engineering and R&D functions. Most recently, Rajat was the CVP of Microsoft’s commerce platform which powers the company’s consumer and business online services like Xbox, Azure and Office 365. In previous roles, Rajat was General Manager and CVP in the Online Services Division and Microsoft Business Division.

Rajat holds a Master’s in Business Administration from Washington State University and a Bachelors in Electrical Engineering from Jadavpur University, Calcutta, India.
